title: Refrigerator + Heated Pool + Gym + 1 Bedroom 1 BA in Torrance
map_address: Anza Avenue near Del Amo Boulevard
posting_body: ['Unit Availability: August 23, 2022', 'Seville Townhouse is in a convenient location in Torrance, California, that puts you just minutes from shopping, dining, and entertainment.', 'When you are ready to go, the beach and Del Amo Fashion Mall are only minutes away!', "When you decide it's time to come home to a quality of life that is beyond your expectations, Seville Townhouse is your only choice!", 'Enjoy the relaxing views of your surroundings after you cook a satisfying meal in your spacious kitchen!', "You'll enjoy a resort-like lifestyle with pool and two hot tubs that are just steps from your front door!", "Our fitness room enables you to work out and work off some steam after a hard day's work.", 'Enjoy coming home to a beautiful community night after night!', '20440 Anza Avenue', 'Torrance, CA 90503', 'Community Amenities:', '- On-Site Management', '- Sauna', '- Covered Parking*', '- Spa/Hot Tub', '- Laundry Facilities', '- Beautiful Landscaping', '- Controlled Access/Gated', '- 5 Minutes From Anza Mall', '- Easy Access to Freeways and Shopping', '- Pool', '- Elevator', '- Sundeck with BBQ Area', '- Ten Minutes to the Beach', '- Fitness Center', 'Apartment Amenities:', '- Refrigerator', '- Air Conditioning', '- Two Closets*', '- Disposal', '- Granite Countertops*', '- Stainless Steel Appliances*', '- Mirrored Closet Doors', '- Ceiling Fans', '- Gas Range', '- Wood Plank Floors*', 'For more information Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information visit: <URL>/', '*With Select Apartment Homes.', 'Equal Housing Opportunity.', 'Price and availability are subject to change.', 'Square ft. is approximate.', 'Interior Photos may not be on exact unit.', 'Cities: Gardena, Redondo Beach, Palos Verdes, Harbor City, Lawndale, Carson, Manhattan Beach + Hermosa Beach']
